snippet: In this fourth installment of the series, the Chipmunks travel to Florida when they think their human minder, Dave, is getting too chummy with his girlfriend.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews animated film Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip, featuring voice of Justin Long.
lead_paragraph: In this fourth installment of the series, the Chipmunks travel to Florida when they think their human minder, Dave, is getting too chummy with his girlfriend.

headline.main: Review: ‘Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip’ Features a Trip to Miami
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip’ Features a Trip to Miami
